full_summary:
# Tender Announcement for Shorebird Monitoring Services

## Title

* English: Using the Arctic Program for Regional and International Shorebird Monitoring to improve and expand shorebird monitoring and inform shorebird population estimates
* French: Utilisation du Programme de surveillance régionale et internationale des oiseaux de rivage dans l’Arctique pour améliorer et élargir la surveillance des oiseaux de rivage et guider les estimations de la population d’oiseaux de rivage

## Reference Information

* Reference Number: cb-156-14242159
* Amendment Number: 4
* Solicitation Number: 5000077311
* Publication Date: 2024-01-03
* Tender Closing Date: 2024-01-18T15:00:00 (expired)

## Procurement Details

* UNSPSC Code: *77101505 (Environmental monitoring)
* Procurement Category: *SRV (Service)
* Notice Type: Advance Contract Award Notice
* Procurement Method: Advance contract award notice

## Service Description

Environment and Climate Change Canada is seeking a contractor to provide shorebird monitoring services. The contractor will be responsible for analyzing Arctic PRISM data for the Ikkattuaq Migratory Bird Sanctuary in Nunavut, producing estimates of breeding shorebird population size and density, and creating a report explaining the methodology and results. Additionally, the contractor will select sites for future Arctic PRISM surveys and provide recommendations on the feasibility of using PRISM data to estimate shorebird abundance and density in protected areas.

## Contact Information

* Name: Samantha Walerickton
* Email: samantha.walerickton@ec.gc.ca
* Phone: (902) 920-4445
* Address: 45 Alderney Dr, Dartmouth, NS, B2Y 2N6, Canada

## Tender Documents

The tender notice and associated documents can be downloaded from the following links:

* English: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28580/5000077311_acan_en.pdf>
* French: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28580/5000077311_pac_fr.pdf>
